downloadTitle: Skype for Business for Android Productivity Guide
downloadDescription: Use this document for step-by-step instructions for installing and using Skype for Business for Android.

detailsSection: Skype for Business for Android is a productivity app that brings Skype Meetings, presence, instant messaging (IM), voice, and video capabilities to your Android mobile device. This document contains guidance and/or step-by-step installation instructions that can be reused, customized, or deleted entirely if they do not apply to your organization’s environment or installation scenarios.
detailsSection_file_name: Skype for Business for Android Productivity Guide.docx
Skype for Business for Android Productivity Guide.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• The file is a Microsoft Word document. Users who do not have Microsoft Word can view this document through the downloadable Word Viewer.
  • The file is also available as an Adobe Reader file. Users who do not have Adobe Reader can download it from Adobe.
installInstructionSection:
1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
  2. Do one of the following:
    • To start the installation immediately, choose Open or Run this program from its current location.
    • To copy the download to your computer for installation at a later time, choose Save or Save this program to disk.
